description: Create RSMS v2.0 extended schema variant (rsms-workorder-v2.0.json) to properly support workorder-tracked resource sheets with fields like workorder_id, feature_id, phase, complexity, etc. Currently using temporary solution with optional fields in base schema.

context.discovered_during: Phase 2 validation revealed RSMS v2.0 schema incompatibility with workorder-tracked resource sheets
context.temporary_solution: Added 9 workorder fields as optional to base schema (resource-sheet-metadata-schema.json) with TEMPORARY comments
context.problem: Base RSMS v2.0 schema designed for static architectural docs, but ecosystem uses resource sheets as workorder deliverables requiring additional lifecycle/tracking metadata
context.impact: 21+ MAJOR validation errors across 6 resource sheets, 0% pass rate before temporary fix

requirements: Create rsms-workorder-v2.0.json schema extending base RSMS v2.0
Use allOf pattern to inherit base schema + add workorder fields
Update validator to auto-detect which schema to use (presence of workorder_id triggers extended schema)
Remove TEMPORARY comments from base schema after migration
Document when to use base vs extended schema
Provide migration guide for existing resource sheets
